duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive client retention, renewals, and expansion opportunities.
Learn all aspects of current book of business to define retention strategy and opportunities for account growth.
Lead launch of new clients and ongoing client management.
Manage client implementations simultaneously, launching accounts on time.
Raise the bar as a founding member of the Client Success team.
Build strong relationships with cross-functional teams, both externally and within Noom.
Inform scalable client implementation processes as we grow the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Healthcare, or a related field (Master's preferred)
